channel.title: CyberNetSec - Cyberattack
channel.description: Latest cyberattack threat intelligence - the last 10 articles

item.title: Washington Post Breached by Clop Ransomware via Oracle Flaws
item.description:
The Washington Post has officially confirmed it was a victim of a large-scale cyberattack orchestrated by the Clop ransomware group. The threat actors exploited vulnerabilities in Oracle's E-Business Suite, compromising over 100 organizations globally. The campaign involves data exfiltration followe...

Severity: High

Categories: Ransomware, Data Breach, Cyberattack

Read Full Article →

item.title: Cloudflare Outage Hits 28% of Global Traffic After Faulty React2Shell Patch
item.description:
Cloudflare, a leading internet infrastructure provider, experienced a 25-minute global outage on December 5, 2025, that impacted approximately 28% of its HTTP traffic and made numerous popular websites inaccessible. The company quickly confirmed the disruption was not a cyberattack but was self-infl...

Severity: High

Categories: Security Operations, Cyberattack, Patch Management

Read Full Article →

item.title: Critical 7-Zip RCE Vulnerability Now Under Active Exploitation
item.description:
A critical remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in the popular 7-Zip file archiver, tracked as CVE-2025-11001, is now being actively exploited in the wild. The path traversal flaw, which affects versions prior to 25.0.0, can be triggered when a user extracts a specially crafted malicious archiv...

Severity: High

Categories: Vulnerability, Patch Management, Cyberattack

Read Full Article →

item.title: CISA Exposes 'BRICKSTORM' Backdoor Used by Chinese State Actors to Infiltrate US Government
item.description:
The US Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA), NSA, and Canadian Centre for Cyber Security have jointly exposed a sophisticated backdoor named 'BRICKSTORM'. According to the December 4, 2025 advisory, People's Republic of China (PRC) state-sponsored actors are using this malware to ...

Severity: High

Categories: Threat Actor, Malware, Cyberattack

Read Full Article →

item.title: React2Shell: Critical 10.0 CVSS RCE Hits React & Next.js, Actively Exploited!
item.description:
A critical unauthenticated remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability, dubbed 'React2Shell' and tracked as CVE-2025-55182, has been disclosed in React Server Components. With a maximum CVSS score of 10.0, the flaw affects popular frameworks like Next.js and allows attackers to take complete control o...

Severity: Critical

Categories: Vulnerability, Cyberattack, Cloud Security

Read Full Article →

item.title: 'Cryptomixer' Shut Down: Authorities Seize €25M in Bitcoin from Laundering Service
item.description:
A coordinated international law enforcement action, codenamed "Operation Olympia," has successfully dismantled Cryptomixer.io, a major cryptocurrency mixing service. Led by Swiss and German authorities with significant support from Europol and Eurojust, the takedown resulted in the seizure of server...

Severity: High

Categories: Policy and Compliance, Cyberattack, Threat Actor

item.title: Iran-Linked MuddyWater APT Targets Israel with New 'MuddyViper' Backdoor
item.description:
The Iranian-affiliated APT group MuddyWater has been observed in a new cyberespionage campaign targeting critical infrastructure and other key sectors in Israel and Egypt. Active from late 2024 to early 2025, the campaign leverages a previously undocumented custom C/C++ backdoor named MuddyViper. Th...

Severity: High

Categories: Threat Actor, Malware, Cyberattack

Read Full Article →

item.title: Warning: Public PoC Exploit Released for Critical Zero-Click Outlook RCE Flaw
item.description:
A proof-of-concept (PoC) exploit has been publicly released for CVE-2024-21413, a critical zero-click remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in Microsoft Outlook nicknamed 'MonikerLink'. The flaw allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code on a victim's machine simply by sending a malicious emai...

Severity: Critical

Categories: Vulnerability, Cyberattack

Read Full Article →

item.title: Qilin Ransomware Gang Adds Business Services Firm B Dynamic to Leak Site
item.description:
The Qilin ransomware group, a prominent ransomware-as-a-service (RaaS) operation, has listed business services company 'B Dynamic' as its latest victim on its dark web data leak site. The December 1, 2025, posting indicates that the company has suffered a network compromise and data exfiltration. By...

Severity: High

Categories: Ransomware, Threat Actor, Cyberattack

Read Full Article →

item.title: Mystery Breach: Major Tech Firm Exposes Millions of Users' Data
item.description:
A major, but currently unnamed, technology company has reportedly suffered a massive data breach, exposing the personal data of millions of users worldwide. The breach was detected on November 24, 2025, after unusual activity was observed on the company's servers, stemming from an unspecified vulner...

Severity: Critical

Categories: Data Breach, Cyberattack, Vulnerability
